amendment.description: To repeal the authorities and requirements for a base closure round in 2005.

vote.text: Amendment SA 849 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 42 - 53. Record Vote Number: 205.

action.text: Amendment SA 849 proposed by Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S7286-7295, S7297; text: CR S7286) To repeal the authorities and requirements for a base closure round in 2005.
